description:
Do you have a passion for Travel? Have you ever thought, "Man this would make a great shot?" If so, you are in the right place! Welcome to Become a Travel Photographer!

This course will go over

  • Photography Guidelines
  • Defining Travel Photography
  • Travel Prerequisites
  • Sources for Travel Research (Answers that "Where should we travel to?" question)
  • How to Make Money using Your Photos that you took abroad.

This course is focused on Beginners in Photography, and Novices at Traveling. Haven't traveled before? No worries, I will help you get the information you need to change that.
title: Become a Travel Photographer!
